article_title: Healthcare providers rank key strategies for improving patient experience while trimming costs
article_text:
As payment moves from fee-for-service to value-based care, improving patient experience can have a very real effect on a hospital's bottom line. But a new survey by the American Society for Quality, an organization that offers certification on varied quality metrics, shows when it comes to patient experience and cost, some strategies are more popular than others.

AQS polled 256 of its members working in the healthcare quality field asking them to rank their top priorities for improving patient experience while reducing costs. Here's what they found, ranked from most to least popular.
